appDescription.message: Well behaved browser tabs for Zendesk agents
appDescription.description: Extension description displayed in Chrome Web Store

txt_welcome_header_main.message: Keep Zendesk in one calm tab

txt_welcome_header_hook.message: Open any Zendesk /agent link and QuickTab routes it to the agent tab you already have open.

txt_welcome_body_what_do.message: Zendesk links pop up everywhere. QuickTab keeps your workspace tidy by reusing the Zendesk tab you are already working in.

txt_welcome_body_new_browser_tab.message: Click a Zendesk ticket link in any app and QuickTab finds your open Zendesk tab, then opens the link there instead.

txt_welcome_body_lose_work.message: No. QuickTab routes navigation inside the agent tab so drafts stay intact.

txt_welcome_body_what_links.message: Any Zendesk link with /agent in the URL: tickets, users, views, admin pages, and more.
